amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete the $74.5 million funding for national missile defense program procurement and increase funding for the tri-care senior pharmacy program and other military health programs accordingly.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to delete the $74.5 million funding for national missile defense program procurement and increase funding for the tri-care senior pharmacy program and other military health programs accordingly.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tierney amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
